revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Power Plant |image = [[File:Power Plant.png|thumb]] |caption = An overhead map of the Power Plant. |tokens = 1,000 |location = North of Lavender Town. }} The '''Power Plant''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Kanto]]. It has 25 tiles arranged in a 5x5 square, including 5 chest tiles, 13 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 13,507 HP.
== Encounter Tables ==
===Wild Encounters===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | [[File:Pikachu.png|40px]] Pikachu || colspan=2 rowspan=5|<center> N/A |- | [[File:Magnemite.png|40px]] Magnemite |- | [[File:Magneton.png|40px]] Magneton |- | [[File:Voltorb.png|40px]] Voltorb |- | [[File:Electrode.png|40px]] Electrode |- |}
===Boss Encounters=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! Base Health !! Boss Trainer !! Pokémon Team !! Base Health |- | [[File:Electabuzz.png|40px]] Electabuzz || <center> 67,535 || colspan=3 rowspan=2|<center> N/A |- | [[File:Zapdos.png|40px]] Zapdos || <center> 101,302 |}

<tab name="Debuff"> After Reaching Sinnoh, the drop chance for items in Kanto will be debuffed for any loot with a Tier rarer than Rare (ie: Epic, Legendary, Mythic).
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !!
